short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blowater is a Nostr DM client

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blowater is a messaging application. It allows users to text each other. It does not read users' current page. It fully respects user privacy. All the messages are end-to-end encrypted so that users are safe to communicate without leaking privacy.
